scripts.cache: composer dumpautoload && composer clear-cache && php artisan optimize && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:clear
scripts.init: npm install && composer install && npm rebuild node-sass && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan storage:link && php artisan migrate && php artisan db:seed && mkdir -p public/build && cp -r node_modules/flag-icon-css/flags/ public/build/flags && gulp watch
